EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Denver (No Show) with opener slides
EmailTemplate.subject: We Missed You at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for your interest in the Leader’s Guide to Adopting Lean Startup at Scale workshop for Kickstarter Backers. We’re thrilled to be delivering this workshop series in partnership with Eric Ries and are sorry you were unable to attend. We appreciate your input as we roll out this new series; please take a moment to let us know <[[https://docs.google.com/a/pivotal.io/forms/d/1PFa13WaBv3q53wj2rdEAqurtWU1C7Ew9ivffA-mauPk/viewform]]> why you couldn’t make it.
In case you’d like to review the workshop materials, they are available online:
- Presentation <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7IxBOTTIF-EaXdqWnlDSnQwcDRDODVLR0pqeGpqM0RMNkVj/view?usp=sharing]]> & Opener <[[https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1j3x_VTDLCCJwHKPsp99QZYp2vXPQsbmOTWky102W5do/edit?usp=sharing]]> - Handouts <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7IxBOTTIF-EX0pPbWY2OG51Ui12NGdzSWlJNnBhR19rQ2xr/view?usp=sharing]]>
Want more?
- If you’re not already part of the Leader’s Guide network, sign up now <[[https://theleadersguide.org/]]>. - Interested in learning more about how Pivotal can work with you? Learn more <[[http://pivotal.io/labs]]>.
We look forward to seeing you at future events!
Best, Michele Perras Sr Director of Strategy Pivotal Labs
